Auxiliary Funcitons¶

src.auxiliaries.create_test_img(size=(200, 200), num_points=100, radius_min=1, radius_max=10)¶

Creates randomly distributed bright dots on black background :param size: (tuple) dimensions of test image :param num_points: (int) number of bright spots :param radius_min: (int) minimum radius for bright spots :param radius_max: (int) maximum radius for bright spots :return: test_img (ndarray), center_list (list), radius_list (list)
